items.title: California GOP Rep. Doug LaMalfa dies at 65
items.description: California GOP Rep. Doug LaMalfa has died at age 65, a top Republican said Tuesday.

items.title: WATCH: Hegseth touts U.S military strength while swearing in new recruits
items.description: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth touts the strength of the U.S. military during the Venezuela intervention while swearing in new recruits in Virginia.
